title: Increase your book sales using Publisher Rocket

tactics.name: Keyword Selection
tactics.description: Identify high-value keywords using search volume, competition, and revenue data
steps: Use keyword search to find shopper-used terms
Prioritize keywords with high search volume
caveats: Avoid keywords with extremely high competition
source_quotes: no other software includes this number and without knowing how many people type the keyword into Amazon...

tactics.name: Category Targeting
tactics.description: Find niche categories with high sales potential
steps: Use category search to identify relevant categories
Check daily sales thresholds for top rankings
Select categories with achievable sales targets
caveats: Ensure category aligns with book content
source_quotes: finding a pertinent category and becoming a bestseller has never been easier

heuristics.name: Search Volume Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If keyword search volume is below 1000, prioritize higher volume keywords
source_quotes: without knowing how many people type the keyword into Amazon...

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides estimated Amazon searches per month for keywords
source_quotes: the estimated number of people who type that keyword into Amazon...

niche_patterns.description: Combine specific audience identities with problems and constraints for niche targeting
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates highly targeted categories with lower competition
source_quotes: finding relevant but niche categories for your book...
